attributes.action: Don’t ban professionally and humanly cropped working dogs being imported to U.K
attributes.additional_details: We’d like you too instead consider tightening up the veterinary board on illegally cropped dogs and demand papers from all dogs with cropped ears it is done humanly and perfectly safe while under anaesthesia in the USA with perfect after care why should these dogs and people who can afford them be penalised because a select few illegally cropping dogs in the uk!
attributes.background: We believe that if you ban properly cropped working dogs being imported it will negatively impact the breeds that are new to the uk and increase the illegal amount of cropped dogs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585877
